description:
A man name Elf suddenly appears in front of Jyugo.
Elf has connection with the man with the scar on his neck and has been looking for the specimen, Jyugo.
Elf conveys that he will harm the people around Jyugo and disappears.
Jyugo fears that something bad might happen to his friends if he stays, so he decides to escape from Nanba Prison alone.
Source: crunchyroll
